task_description: Head straight along the street, keeping the green bike lane on your left and passing the Four Seasons Hotel. Cross the intersection and continue forward past The Highlight at Houston Center. The destination, Phoenicia Specialty Foods, will be on your right, marked by large green lettering and a red vertical sculpture.
